entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:04 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snowshower, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Snowshower
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
